definitions.body: tribe of nomads in Arab. desert Is 21:16, Is 42:11 (c. vb. fem.), Is 60:7, Je 2:10, Je 49:28, Je 49:28, Ez Eze 27:21; ´[[בְּנֵי־ק]]: Is 21:17; ´[[אָהֳלֵי ק]]: Ps 120:5, Ct So 1:5 (made of black goat-skins Jacob:Beduinenleben (2), 41 or black woven stuff Doughty:Arab. Des. i. 224 f.; sim. of swarthy hue).
son of Ishmael, Ge 25:13 = 1Ch 1:29.—Cf. As. Ḳidru COT:Ge 25:13, Plin:NH v. 11 (12) Cedrei; also Sab. tribe-name [[קדר]] Hal:623 (cf. DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 14).
